description:
Nishikata is so happy summer vacation is starting, but Takagi-san doesn`t seem that excited.
She suggests they should practice tandem riding during vacation. When Nishikata agrees, she finally seems enthusiastic about summer vacation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futarinori / Natsuyasumi Shonichi / Kimodameshi / Jiyuukenkyuu / Suidou
Rouler à deux / Premier jour des vacances / L`épreuve de courage / Journal d’observations / La fontaine
